sourceMeaningMnemonic: You take all of your <radical>thread</radical> and <radical>allocate</radical> them into one place to <kanji>unite</kanji> them. With all your thread united and wrapped together, you're ready to <kanji>rule</kanji> and <kanji>govern</kanji> the world!
meaningInfo: Allocate all of your thread like you would your cash: by uniting it! Not at a bank, but in a big, intertwined lump. Now nobody can stop you and your big lump of thread!
readingMnemonic: You're busy trying to <kanji>unite</kanji> all of your thread, twisting and tying and wrapping, and suddenly you look at the ball in your hands and see <ja><reading>とう</reading>きょう</ja>. You've united this thread into the shape of <ja>とうきょう</ja>. There are even little pins for all the famous neighborhoods and tourist spots. This is strange, because you don't remember putting them there.
readingInfo: Try to do this yourself at home. Unite all of your thread and poof! There's <ja>とうきょう</ja>!
